title: Problem on logging in plz help riot
body: the past 2 weeks i have been having trouble login in to league, sometimes its stuck on Authenticating and other times the client just goes black and says retry without anything happening.

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is unstable or struggling, and losing communication with client services.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up.  I don't recommend queuing up for games until this is fixed, you could also run into problems matchmaking otherwise.
